{"id":299536635,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1580636589,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"76 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/299536635/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"12.8 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def addTwoNumbers(self, l1: ListNode, l2: ListNode, carry=0) -> ListNode:\n        \"\"\"O(max(l1, l2) time and space)\"\"\"\n        if l1 is None and l2 is None:\n            return None if carry == 0 else ListNode(carry)\n        left = right = 0\n        if l1:\n            left = l1.val\n            l1 = l1.next\n        if l2:\n            right = l2.val\n            l2 = l2.next\n        node = ListNode((left + right + carry)%10)\n        carry = (left + right + carry) // 10\n        node.next = self.addTwoNumbers(l1, l2, carry)\n        return node","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
